data.text: @parktheplastic1 @Kenwood_House @SearcysLondon @FriendsKenwood Hi there, the cups for drinks purchased in Kenwoodâ€™s cafes are either recyclable or compostable however, there are some single-use cups by the water stand. We appreciate your feedback and have shared this with our Catering team.
@parktheplastic1 @EnglishHeritage @Kenwood_House @FriendsKenwood Thank you for the message. This image is not associated with Searcys London as we no longer operate this location. Thank you.

@parktheplastic1 @EnglishHeritage @Kenwood_House @SearcysLondon @FriendsKenwood @EHKenwood, can we ask why you aren't using crockery in your cafe? What the world doesn't need is more unnecessary, unrecyclable plastic lined cups!!!
